snippet: The suspect, David A. Mitchell, 42, recently arrived in New York after a string of incarcerations in the South for felonies including kidnapping, abduction and robbery.
abstract: David A Mitchell, arrested and charged with the rape, beating and robbery of a 73-year-old woman in Central Park, is a drifter from the South who spent most of his adult life in and out of prison on various felonies including kidnapping, abduction and robbery; Mitchell arrived in Central Park in July, where he almost immediately inspired fear in park regulars, one of whom he threatened with a knife on Aug 20.

byline.original: By WENDY RUDERMAN and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: The suspect, David A. Mitchell, 42, recently arrived in New York after a string of incarcerations in the South for felonies including kidnapping, abduction and robbery.

headline.seo: Drifter Is Charged With Raping 73-Year-Old Woman in Central Park
headline.main: Drifter Known for Menace Is Charged With Raping Woman, 73, in Central Park
headline.print_headline: Drifter Known for Menace Is Charged With Raping Woman, 73, in Central Park
